alert.note: Alert for Greater Vancouver Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 21 at 2:40PM PST until December 22 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts 40 to 55 mph expected. Strongest winds in the hills and near the Columbia River Gorge. * WHERE...In Oregon, Greater Portland Metro Area. In Washington, Greater Vancouver Area. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 4 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Very cold temperatures will combine with the wind to produce wind chills near zero.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
